Attributes.description: Japanese travel literature (myths, legends, poetry, tales, diaries, illustrated guides, satiric sermons, haiku, comic fiction, colonial reporting, and ethnography) from the 8th century to present.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Restricted to fourth-year students. A minimum of 9 credits of 300-level ASIA coursework recommended.)
